name: orokos.com - Adapt Stat Calculator for Mobile App
description:
Simple script to bring the D&D 4th Edition stat calculator at orokos.com as close to a comfortable native mobile app as possible.

(Unfortunately, Firefox Mobile doesn't yet obey @viewport, so it's not yet perfect and, since Userstyles.org doesn't even allow @viewport and vendor-prefixed derivatives to be posted, I can't just future-proof it either.)

user.name: ssokolow
user.about: Userstyles.org has a bug which keeps resetting my notification e-mail address. I strongly recommend using the contact form on my blog if you want me to notice. I also sometimes go into more detail about my userstyles on my blog. See the userstyle tag for a list of those.
